alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 6:43AM CST until February 24 at 12:51PM CST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia...Tennessee... Lookout Creek near New England affecting Dade and Hamilton Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Lookout Creek near New England. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15 feet, Minor flooding continues to expand along Sells Lane in Trenton, Mason Road near Rising Fawn, and Creek Road near New England. These roads and other roads with creeks flowing into Lookout Creek will flood causing the roads to be closed. The water will be a few feet deep on portions of these roads. Also minor flooding will continue to expand downstream as the creek crosses the Tennessee border into the Tiftonia area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 15.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 12 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
